bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Advanced Audio and Video Coding
Amendment 1: Extension on Timing and Location Information to Support Object Tracking across Multiple Cameras at Surveillance High Group
IEEE Standard for Advanced Audio and Video Coding - Amendment 1: Extension on Timing and Location Information to Support Object Tracking across Multiple Cameras at Surveillance High Group

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Extensions to IEEE Std 1857(TM)-2013 are provided for surveillance video to support tracking across tracing in multiple cameras at surveillance based on the navigation information which mainly includes timing, location and movement information.

Extensions to IEEE Std 1857(TM)-2013 are provided for surveillance video to support tracking across tracing in multiple cameras at surveillance based on the navigation information which mainly includes timing, location and movement information.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
